:memo: Create a Pull Request using GitHub flow

-   Create a new branch in your local repository.
-   Add, commit, and push changes in the new branch.
-   Create and merge a pull request for this new branch on GitHub

:memo: Protect your Main Branch
- Go to your repository's "Settings" and select "Branches".
- Under "Branch protection rules", click "Add rule" and enter "main" in the "Branch name pattern" field.
- Enable the desired protection options (e.g., require pull request reviews) and click "Create" to save the rule.
